main event: Several objects were sighted in the SW Bermuda Islands on July 14, 1958, moving at great speed and appearing to disintegrate.
interesting points: Objects were described as bright and green by multiple witnesses., Sighting lasted approximately 3-4 minutes., Observations were made from both military and civilian sources., Local residents reported sightings of multiple green objects breaking up in the sky., Objects were possibly meteors, as concluded by some investigators.
sighted object: several bright green objects in the sky
